guides.augmentsTip: Shaco is a snowball carry so only play from spots you are very likely to hit quickly. Shaco does not stack permanent AD on PvE rounds. Darius has built-in Sunder. Board caps with Renekton or Garen.

tips.tip: Focus on getting permanent AD stacks on Shaco. Slam items as you get them while stacking econ. You likely won't lose streak fully but it's okay if you gain stacks.
If you are close to Shaco (6+ copies), hyper roll at Stage 3-1 / Level 4 for Shaco 3. Otherwise, slow roll boave 50g for Shaco.
Push levels for Slayers. Zed / Senna takes leftover AD items. If you get Syndicate emblem, play on Zed and play 5 Syndicate.

guides.title: Mad Hatter

guides.augmentsTip: Your Robot upgrades to a Dinosaur at 200 stacks. Nidalee and Elise 3 can do good damage but only take leftover items. Itemizing Kindred is okay early but falls off hard late game.

tips.tip: Prioritize stacking your Nitro Robot ASAP with Veigar. Prioritize Veigar items. Focus on econ.
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll for at least Veigar 2 and Shyvana 2. You can play Elise on 6 or another frontline unit. Slow roll above 50g for Veigar 3.
If you have AP items and lots of gold, you can chase Elise 3. Otherwise, level for more Cyberboss or support traits.

guides.title: Nitro Veigar

guides.augmentsTip: Positioning shown is reference for a specific Hex pattern. Make sure you adjust accordingly.

tips.tip: Play strongest board. Econ up.
Play strongeset board. Econ up.
Roll down for Ziggs and Neeko. Go to 9.

guides.title: Bomberman Ziggs

guides.augmentsTip: Aim for a 290+ Intel cashout. The latest you want to start Cypher is end of Stage 2. Aim to cashout with at least two lives so you have time to transition and react.

tips.tip: If you start with Cypher, focus on lose streaking while making econ. Otherwise, play best board and winstreak.
If you are lose streak Cypher, keep loss streak until Stage 4. If you snap your lose streak, consider cashing out early and pivoting to tempo.
Cash out Cypher and transition towards Zeri, 3 Cypher, and Bastions. Senna and Renekton are flexible spots. Get to 9 for 5 costs.

guides.title: Cypher Zeri

guides.augmentsTip: Get to 6 Golden Ox ASAP to start farming components. You can only trigger Golden Ox once per turn so it may be worth at times to pre-level and lose 1-2 interest gold that round. Garen mod Golden Ox on your other carries for maximum value.

tips.tip: Play around Graves as the primary item holder for both Aphelios and tank items. The first interval for Golden Ox that is clean is 2-5 double level to 5.
If you are very rich, consider pre-leveling to 6 for a Golden Ox trigger. If you have emblem, look for 4 Golden Ox. Roll some if you have impactful pairs.
If you are very rich, consider pre-leveling to 8 over 2 turns for Golden Ox triggers. Roll for Aphelios and 6 Ox Force ASAP. Go 9 for Viego.

guides.title: Golden OxDD

guides.augmentsTip: The core of the composition only needs 2 Dynamo + 3 Syndicate Miss Fortune. Flex between 2-4 Dynamo and other high value units. You often play 5 Syndicate to get to level 9 then replace over time with upgraded 5-costs.

tips.tip: Play a strong winstreak AD opener, preferably around Jhin and Exotech Bastions. Your best opener involves an offensive Exotech item for Jhin.
Level to 6 and maintain winstreak. Roll if you have 3+ impactful pairs. Consider taking an econ augment if you haven't already.
Fast 8 and look for Miss Fortune, 2 Dynamo, and at least 3 Syndicate. You can duo carry Elise until you find Aurora. Go 9 for 5 costs.

guides.title: Miss Fortune Flex

guides.augmentsTip: Choose weapons based on your damage type (Sunder = physical, Shred = magical). Prioritize true tank items on Leona instead of utility. 10 Anima Squad will win most games, but requires 2 emblems / 10 team size.

tips.tip: Open with a solid Shojin holder (ideally Seraphine) and 3 Anima Squad. If you have Anima Squad emblem, aim for 5 Anima ASAP.
Level for 5 Anima Squad and upgraded frontline, Vayne holds for Xayah, Seraphine/Yuumi for Aurora.
Get to level 8 and find 7 Anima Squad. Stabilize around Xayah 2 and Leona 2 before getting to level 9. Play Viego or another 5 cost on 9.

guides.title: Anima Squad

guides.augmentsTip: You can check Team Planner and hover over an Exotech unit to see what are the Exotech items before you commit to an augment. 5 costs cap the board the best: Kobuko > Garen/Aurora/Renekton > Zac

tips.tip: Play around early Marksman and Bastions for winstreak. Use your Exotech item advantage to get 3 items quickly.
Level for 5 Exotech and Bastions. You should have full 3 items on a frontline and a backline unit. Econ up for Fast 8.
Fast 8 @ 4-2 and look for Zeri, Sejuani, and 7 Exotech. If you can't find them, play 5 Exotech while flexing other traits. Go 9 for 5 costs.

guides.title: Exotech

guides.augmentsTip: Street Demon positioning changes every game so adjust accordingly. Zyra / Strategist holds items for Brand. Jinx holds items for Samira. Neeko holds for Kobuko 2. Can also flex down to 5 Street Demon for 5 costs (Viego, Garen).

tips.tip: Play around your upgraded Street Demons. Slam your items aggressively and play for winstreak.
Level and add more Street Demons. You can flex in other traits like Strategists, AMP, and Techies. Econ up.
Level to 8 and roll down for Brand, Neeko, and 7 Street Demon. Once stable, go to 9 for 5 costs.

guides.title: Streetagists

guides.augmentsTip: 4 Vanguard is the standard frontline but you can flex in other units if you are contested such as Bruisers, Bastions, Zac, etc. In mid/late game, stack Golden Ox every turn if it doesn't cost you more than 1-2 gold of interest.

tips.tip: Play a strong tempo opener around Rageblade and Vanguard opener while econning up.
Level for 4 Vanguard + any backline duo carry that can play Rageblade. 2 Slayers (Vayne), 2 Marksman (Jhin/Jinx), or 2 Rapidfire (TF).
Fast 8 and look for 4 Marksman and 4 Vanguard. Jinx 2 can hold items temporarily if you are struggling to upgrade your 4 costs. Go 9 for 5 costs.

guides.title: Marksman Vanguard

guides.augmentsTip: Play when you have early Graves and Executioners. Rengar is very versatile with Artifacts (listed in Alt Builds). Be mindful of Golden Ox intervals for damage amp early. Position Executioners on same side of enemy carry.

tips.tip: Play around Graves and Golden Ox early to winstreak while making econ. Graves can hold pretty much any melee or tank item.
Level to 6 for more Executioner and relevant traits around your frontline. If you still don't have Graves 2, roll a few times to upgrade him.
Level to 7 to roll for upgrades and 4 Executioner. Econ back up and slow roll for 3* Varus and Rengar. If you are very rich with extra items, you can chase Graves 3.

guides.title: Executioner Reroll

guides.augmentsTip: Positioning will change every game pending on Street Demon hexes. Ekko 3 holds items until you get Neeko 2. If you get Strategist emblem, drop Yuumi for another 5 cost or more frontline.

tips.tip: Either play an econ focused AP opener or a Cypher lose streak. Focus on Leblanc items first.
Level to 6 at 3-2 and roll for Ekko 2, Leblanc 2, and Street Demons. Econ back up and slow roll for 3* units.
Finish your 3* then level for more Strategists and Kobuko. The 8th unit can be any 5 cost (Garen, Viego, Renekton, Zac) or Bruiser/AMP.

guides.title: Strategist Reroll

guides.augmentsTip: Strategist emblem not necessary. Composition is VERY expensive so prioritize econ heavily. Positioning will change every game pending on the Street Demon hexes. Aim for Viego on 9. Leftover AD on Samira.

tips.tip: Either play around a strong winstreak AP early game (Example: Techies and Bastions) or lose streak with Cypher / Open Fort
If winstreaking, add other relevant traits, such as Strategists, Street Demons, or more Techies. If lose streaking, cash out Cypher at 3-7.
Level to 8 and look for Annie, Neeko, and Strategists. Play around Brand until you find Samira. Once stable, go 9 for 5 costs.

guides.title: Strategist AMP

guides.augmentsTip: Kogmaw can fall off hard late game so play this only from strong openers with early copies of Kogmaw / Skarner. MR Shred is useful for Boom Bot magic damage. Garen with Vanguard mod caps the board.

tips.tip: Collect Kogmaw and Vanguards while focusing on econ. Prioritize Kogmaw items on first carousel.
Roll above 50g for Kogmaw 3, Skarner, and other Vanguards. Every 3* Vanguard besides Skarner is luxury so only chase if rich / hitting quickly.
Finish upgrading your board then push levels for 6 Vanguards. Zeri holds leftover offensive items. Garen or Renekton on 9.

guides.title: Kog-Guards

guides.augmentsTip: You can also primary tank Braum instead of Darius. Kogmaw and Skarner are luxury 3* units and can be replaced by higher tier units (Zeri, Leona). Look for Garen, Aurora, or Renekton on 9. Leftover AD on MF.

tips.tip: Play early Rapidfire Vanguard for tempo and prioritize Twisted Fate items. Kogmaw 2 is better than Twisted Fate 1 early.
Level up and roll for TF 2, 3 Syndicate, and upgraded frontline. Make TF your Syndicate Kingpin.
Slow roll above 50g and get TF 3* + a tank to 3*. Level for 5 Syndicate and make your tank the 2nd Kingpin.

guides.title: Card Shark

guides.augmentsTip: You can play this from either a tempo winstreak opener or a Cypher cashout. Zeri's best Exotech item is Flux Capacitor. If you are very rich, you can chase Draven 3 as a duo carry.

tips.tip: Play from winstreak when you have early Rageblade and upgrades. If you are playing lose streak, look for Cypher units in shop + on carousel.
Level up for 4 Bastion and backline. Jhin 2 is the ideal item holder. If Cypher streak, maintain lose streak at least until 3-7.
Fast 8 and roll for Zeri, Sejuani and 6 Bastion. Once stable, go to level 9 for Garen. Leftover items on Renekton.

guides.title: Bastion Zeri

guides.augmentsTip: Tips and Augments coming soon

tips.tip: Coming Soon
Coming Soon
Coming Soon

guides.title: Bastion Marksman

guides.augmentsTip: Positioning will change each game depending on the Street Demon hexes. Fiddle has built in 20% Shred but you still want anti-MR items. Emblem can be on Neeko until you hit Kobuko.

tips.tip: Look for a strong AP opener around Techie and upgraded frontline. Slam items aggressively and play for winstreak.
Level to 6 for more frontline: Bastions, Bruisers, Street Demons. If you have a few pairs, roll for upgrades.
Fast 8 and roll for Brand and at least 6 Techies. If you hit Viego, play 8 Techies immediately. Once stable, go 9 for Renekton / 5 costs.

guides.title: Tempo Techies

guides.augmentsTip: Fiddle has built in 20% Shred so Shred is lower priority than usual. Position Fiddlesticks same side as enemy carry. Renekton can take leftover AD and consume a 3* Bruiser (not Fiddlesticks).

tips.tip: Play around Bruiser opener. If you have Blighting Jewel, Morgana is the best early holder. Prioritize Fiddlesticks' AP items and econ.
Level for more frontline of whatever Techie you hit (Bastions, Bruisers, etc). Roll some on 6 if you have 3+ pairs.
Level to 7 and roll for Fiddle 2, Morde 2, and 6 Bruiser. Econ up and slow roll above 50g for Fiddle 3. After you finish 3*, level for Renekton / Kobuko.

guides.title: Fiddlesticks Morde

guides.augmentsTip: Strongest Cyberboss = # of items > last unit fielded on the board. The last spots in this composition are flex. 6 Bastion, Garen, Viego carry, or Divinicorp are all playable. If no Kobuko, cut down to 2 and make Veigar the Cyberboss.

tips.tip: Play around early Veigar with Blue Buff. Prioritize at least 2 Veigar items then slam whatever remaining tank on Poppy / frontline.
Level to 6 at 3-2 then roll for Veigar 2 and 4 Bastion. Econ and slow roll for 3* Veigar. If you have a reroll augment, you can chase 3* Bastion tank.
Once you finish Veigar 3, push levels. If you find Kobuko, play 4 Cyberboss ASAP. Add 5 costs like Viego or Renekton at 9.

guides.title: Cyberboss Reroll

guides.augmentsTip: Divinicorp emblem not 100% mandatory, but it is very powerful on Zed. Garen ideally gets Divinicorp, but you can flex in any other high cost that helps your frontline. Leftover AD on Senna, leftover AP on Vex.

tips.tip: Play a generic strong AD opener and slam items for tempo. Holding Morgana is not important so play or sell based on your econ.
Play high tempo around Slayers (Senna), Vanguards (Rhaast), or Bruisers (Gragas). Flex in extra Divinicorp when you have a free slot.
Fast 8 and look for Zed and as many Divinicorp units as you can. You can flex in 4 Slayer or other traits that support Zed. Go 9 for Renekton / 5 costs.

guides.title: Divinicorp Zed

guides.augmentsTip: Only play this comp with a Cypher cashout. Roll for this composition on level 8. Focus on Draven items > Zed items. Renekton takes whatever leftover. Senna 3 is optional.

tips.tip: If you start with Cypher, focus on lose streaking while making econ. Otherwise, play best board and winstreak.
If you are lose streak Cypher, keep loss streak until Stage 4. If you snap your lose streak, consider cashing out early and pivoting to tempo.
Cash out Cypher and transition towards zed/draven +senna/zeri carries. Only carry zeri with rageblade + offensive exotech item. Can use extra econ to roll for draven/senna/galio 3 on 8.

guides.title: Cypher Zed Draven

guides.augmentsTip: Best on item portals like Component Anvils and you have early Vaynes. Primary tank is flexible: 3* Jarvan > 3* Braum > 2* Leona. Senna or Zed can be your duo carry late game.

tips.tip: Slam Rageblade early and play for tempo with Vayne + upgraded Vanguards. Anima Squad early is the ideal setup.
Level to 6 at 3-2 and roll for any upgrades with Vayne and your primary tank. Look for 4 Vanguard here. Winstreak rest of Stage 3.
Slow roll above 50g on level 6 and finish your 3*s. Level to 7 and add in 4 Slayer. At 8, add in any strong 5 cost or Divinicorp.

guides.title: Slay Queen

guides.augmentsTip: Tips coming soon

tips.tip: Coming Soon
Coming Soon
Coming Soon

guides.title: Vancard

guides.augmentsTip: Button Mash Hero Augment mandatory. Can also play 6 Bastion Poppy reroll and Fast 9 for 4 Cyberboss. 3* Priority: Poppy > Shyvana > Nidalee = Veigar > Kindred.

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Poppy, Nitro and econ up. Finish 3 items on Poppy ASAP. Sell extra Veigars if you need econ.
Slow roll for Poppy 3, 3* Nitro, and Veigar on level 5. You likely can't 3* everything so choose whatever you are closest then push levels after.
Look for Ziggs and Kobuko for 4 Cyberboss. Shyvana 3 holds items until you find Kobuko. Last unit slot can be any support trait (Strategist, Bruiser, etc.)

guides.title: Button Mash Poppy

guides.augmentsTip: Adaptive Strikes Hero Augment mandatory. Jax may need to be moved back to the second row in late game situations where he is getting burst down too quickly. Best Exotech item is often a strong offensive one for Jax early then Zeri late.

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Jax, Bastions and econ up. Finish 3 items on Jax ASAP. Exotech item can be played on him early, but most are not good late game.
Slow roll for Jax 3* and other Bastions. Kindred is your item holder for Zeri, but 3* Kindred is not important.
Level and get in 6 Bastion with Zeri backline. Renekton should eat your highest HP Bastion that isn't Sejuani.

guides.title: Adaptive Strikes Jax

guides.augmentsTip: Cease and Desist Hero Augment mandatory. If Vayne is contested, aim for other backline AD carry such as Senna or Xayah / Aurora. Cap the board with Vanguard Garen mod on himself + give him items.

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Vi, Vanguards and econ up. If you have Cypher early, you can play for a small cash out.
Slow roll for Vi 3* and other Vanguards. If you are playing Cypher lose streak, consider cashing out 3-3 so you can start winning fights.
Push levels and add more Vanguards. Position Vi same side as enemy carry. Cap the board with a 5 cost.

guides.title: Cease and Desist Vi

guides.augmentsTip: Alter Ego Hero Augment mandatory. Divinicorp will be the most common variation but you can also play 6 Vanguard Slayers. Duo carry any other Slayer that you can reasonably hit: Senna 3 > Vayne 3 = Zed 2 > Senna 2 > Vayne 2

tips.tip: Pick the Hero Augment and begin collecting copies of Rhaast, Vayne, and supporting Divinicorp. Finish 3 items Rhaast ASAP
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll until you have 2* Rhaast, 4 Vanguard, and preferably Vayne 2. Econ up and begin slow rolling on 6 for Rhaast 3.
If you have 7+ copies of Rhaast and very rich, you can level to 7 to roll for Rhaast 3 while looking for Senna / Zed. Always play Renekton on Senna.

guides.title: Alter Ego Rhaast (Kayn)

guides.augmentsTip: Chug Bug Hero Augment mandatory. Play this like the standard Morde and Fiddle Reroll with an extra carry. Fiddle has built in 20% Shred so Shiv / Spark is lower priority than usual. Position Fiddlesticks same side as Gragas and the enemy carry.

tips.tip: Play around Bruiser opener. Prioritize as many rods as possible we need to build 2 AP carries and econ up.
Level for Bruisers. Roll some on 6 if you have 3+ pairs and winstreaking. Otherwise, level to 7 on 3-5 and roll if low hp, or Level on 4-1 and roll.
Level to 7 and roll for Fiddle 2, Morde 2, Gragas 2, and 6 Bruiser. Econ up and slow roll above 50g for Fiddle 3 and Gragas 3. After you finish 3*, level for Renekton / Kobuko.

guides.title: Chug Bug Gragas

guides.augmentsTip: Your Robot upgrades to a Dinosaur at 200 stacks. Nidalee and Elise 3 can do good damage but only take leftover items. Itemizing Kindred is okay early but falls off hard late game.

tips.tip: Prioritize stacking your Nitro Robot ASAP with Jhin. Prioritize Jhin items. Focus on econ.
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll for at least Jhin 2 and Shyvana 2. Play Jax/Sejuani over Elise on 6. Slow roll for 3 stars on level 6.
Add in Elise at 7. If you have AP items and lots of gold, you can chase Elise 3. Level 8+ prio: Aurora/Garen > Viego > AMP units.

guides.title: Nitro Jhin

guides.augmentsTip: Wolf Unchained Hero Augment mandatory. Xayah takes leftover AD, Aurora takes leftover AP. Best Aurora bench units: Urgot, Zac, Kobuko > Sejuani, Leona

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Sylas, Anima Squad and econ up. Finish Sylas 3 items ASAP.
Slow roll for Sylas 3* and other Anima Squad. Make sure to activate Vanguard and don't get baited into playing 5 Anima Squad on level 5.
Finish your 3* and push levels for more Anima Squad. Last spot is flexible (Renekton, Garen are best).

guides.title: Wolf Unchained Sylas

guides.augmentsTip: Fiddle has built in 20% Shred but you still want anti-MR items. Sell Poppy 3 for Kobuko 2.

tips.tip: Collect early Seraphines, Zyras, Shyvanna, and Poppy. Focus on getting items for Seraphine quickly then prioritize frontline.
Stay level 5 and roll above 50g for Seraphine 3, Zyra 3, and Poppy 3. If you don't have many copies of Zyra/Shyvana, abandon and push levels.
Level and add more techies. If you don't have Zyra 3, give extra damage items to Brand.

guides.title: Techie Reroll

guides.augmentsTip: 3* Nitro is not necessary in this variant. Instead, we focus on winstreaking with basic 2* Nitro to push for a Fast Level 8. Zeri can get bitten by Renekton then dash to the back row for safety + heal up with Gunblade.

tips.tip: Prioritize stacking your Nitro Robot ASAP with Jhin / Exotech. Prioritize Zeri items on Jhin.
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll for any upgrades you need with the 3 Nitro / 3 Exotech board. Econ up for fast 8.
Fast 8 and look for Zeri 2, Sejuani 2, and 4 Nitro. You can take out Jax and flex in other units until Renekton (Morde + Gragas, Jhin + Aurora, etc)

guides.title: Nitro Zeri
